LOGIN_SUCCESS: You have successfully logged in! Redirecting!
SESSION_INVALIDATED_SUCCESS: You have successfully logged out! You'll be redirected to the home page...
SPECIFIED_SESSION_INVALIDATED_SUCCESS: The specified session has been invalidated! Reloading the page...
ALL_SESSIONS_INVALIDATED_SUCCESS: All sessions have been invalidated! Reloading the page...
USER_DATA_UPDATED: You have successfully updated that data! Reloading the page...
EMAIL_CHANGED_NEEDS_VERIFICATION: You have successfully changed your email address! You'll need to verify it before you can log in again...
PAYMENT_METHOD_ADDED: You have successfully added a payment method! Reloading the page...
PAYMENT_METHOD_REMOVED: You have successfully removed a payment method! Reloading the page...
REGENERATED_NOTIFICATIONS_TOKEN: You have successfully regenerated your notifications token!
COLLECTION_CREATED: You have successfully created a new collection. Redirecting...
COLLECTION_DATA_UPDATED: You have successfully updated that collection! Reloading the page...
COLLECTION_PUBLISHED_SUCCESSFULLY: You have successfully published that collection!
COLLECTION_UNPUBLISHED_SUCCESSFULLY: You have successfully unpublished that collection!
CARD_CREATED: You have successfully created a new card. Redirecting...
